page.title: 03Clubs in Gwyddelwern
page.content: There are numerous clubs/societies in the Gwyddelwern area and these are usually held in the village hall. Even though this is the age of instant entertainment these are well attended. Many are held in welsh and these are {Merched y Wawr}(womens club held monthly on a Wednesday evening),{Y {Cymdeithas}a Monthly Entertainment for all ages originally organised by the chapel, this is held on Tuesday, {Cymdeithas Drama}(Drama Society and {Ysgol Feithrin}(Play School, held twice weekly). The remainder are bi-lingual.{Clwb y Wern}(over 60's) held monthly on a Wednesday afternoon, {Youth Club,}Thursday evening or more if there are competitions.{The Womens {Institute}is held monthly on a Friday evening. There is also a nightly {snooker club,}and a{Clay Pidgeon {Shooting Club. } Carol White.
